```{r}
gg_mat2 =function(mat, matref) {
  df = as.data.frame(which(!is.na(mat), arr.ind = TRUE))
  
  dfref=as.data.frame(which(!is.na(matref), arr.ind = TRUE))
  
  df$val = mat[which(!is.na(mat))]
  dfref$val=matref[which(!is.na(matref))]
  
  df=df[df$col<df$row,]
  dfref=dfref[dfref$col>dfref$row,]
  
  dfall=rbind(df,dfref)
  
  ggplot(dfall) + geom_tile(aes(x=col, y=row, fill = val)) + coord_fixed()
}
```

```{r}
gg_mat2(mrflist$cmalign$mat_apc,mrflist$input$mat_apc)
```

library(ggplot2)


gg_mrfcontact= function(mrf){
  ggdata=mrf$mat_apc

  RNAmrf::gg_mat(ggdata)+
    
  scale_fill_gradient2(name="DCA")+
    labs(x="Sequence Index",y="Sequence Index")
}
